summary: A daedric armor for the vampire lord (both genders)
descriptionHtml:
---Description---
So this is an armor for the female and male vampire lord. I know a lot of people have been craving for some kind of armor for a long time, and here\'s my shot at it.

--Video---
Skyrim mods weekly #22 were so kind to feature my mod in the video.
[youtube]XA3OIpKtY4k[/youtube]
(Though it\'s the unstable male mesh)

---Issues---
It seems that the male version is unstable for the moment so please wait with the male version. I\'m looking into this right now. Sorry for any inconvenience!

---Installation/Uninstallation---
Just drop the meshes folder in within your data folder and overwrite if asked.
Program or Program (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data

Remove vampirelord/vampirelordfemale and vampirelordarmor/vampirelordfemalebasearmor within your character assets folder. This is located in:
Program or Program (x86)\\steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\\meshes\\actors\\vampirelord\\character assets

---Future plans---
Werewolf armors and a completely new model for the vampire lord.

---Other---
The textures seen in the screenshots are from \"Daedric Armor and weapon Improvement\",
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3104/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=3104
author: Loke
